title: Thursday Post Show (02-10-22)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (02-10-22)
description:
Bobby tried to watch Raised by Wolves last night on HBO Max and wasn’t feeling it. Bobby talks about how he is signing his new kid’s book. Amy talks about her latest guest on her podcast talking about technology contracts. Amy shares a story about her friend dating a guy that had different names under all their streaming services. Is that a red flag? Kim Kardashian reveals why she divorced Kanye West.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
